MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Arthur Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.01pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected as our team has established there is an underground cable fault, they are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:57 PM on Sunday, 22 November 2020.
